profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in developing high-performance applications using **Python**, **AWS**, **Azure**, **CI/CD**, and **GitHub**. My proficiency in building scalable solutions is complemented by hands-on experience with cloud services, automation strategies, and data processing technologies such as **Airflow**, **dbt**, and **Spark**. With a strong background in SQL and a commitment to delivering robust code, I consistently tackle complex problems with effective solutions and clear communication.
I specialize in full-stack development utilizing technologies like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, with experience leading enterprise-grade projects. My deep understanding of microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and compliance standards, including HIPAA and PCI DSS, enables me to develop secure applications. Additionally, I have implemented machine learning workflows, refining my expertise in automation and collaboration tools to enhance operational efficiency.
